item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Henry Ward Beecher
item.description: "Hold yourself to a higher standard than anyone else expects of you. Never excuse yourself." -- Henry Ward Beecher

item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "So long as you can sweeten another's pain, life is not in vain." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Jim Valvano
item.description: "To me there are three things everyone should do every day. Number one is laugh. Number two is think -- spend some time time in thought. Number three, you should have your emotions move you to tears. If you laugh, think and cry, that's a heck of a day." -- Jim Valvano

item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Love is life. All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love. Everything is, everything exists, only because I love. Everything is united by it alone. Love is God, and to die means that I, a particle of love, shall return to the general and eternal source." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Howard Thurman
item.description: "Donâ€™t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive." -- Howard Thurman

item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Never bend your head. Hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Ashlee add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi
